ygData.subject: Re: No More Sash Cheats...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and well met! I am indeed on the Erollisi Marr server. And yes, Brother Monel has become my friend. I just spoke to him yesterday. I am a friend to all
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and well met! I am indeed on the Erollisi Marr
server. And yes, Brother Monel has become my friend. I
just spoke to him yesterday. I am a friend to all
monks (until they prove unworthy. I posted about a
greedy brother a while ago) and especially those who
would travel with an acquiantance of mine. Merely send
me a tell and I will help you in any way that I can.

Good journeys and may Truth guide you,
Brother Kingdok
Ashen Order monk of the twentieth season
Man at Arms of the Magius Knights
Erollisi Marr server
__________________________________________________
